vulnerabilities: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions
description: The function does not validate the input parameters which can lead to unexpected behavior (CWE-20). It also does not check for unusual or exceptional conditions that might occur during the execution of the program (CWE-754). There is also a potential for NULL pointer dereference (CWE-476) as the function does not check if the objects it is accessing (yy, $$, etc.) are not null before using them.
